text: Retreat, Hell! is a 1952 American Korean War drama movie. It was directed by Joseph H. Lewis. Actors include Frank Lovejoy, Richard Carlson, Anita Louise, Russ Tamblyn, Lamont Johnson, Dorothy Patrick, and Nedrick Young. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * Category:1952 drama movies Category:1952 war movies Category:American war movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies set in North Korea Category:Movies directed by Joseph H. Lewis
title: Retreat, Hell!
